data.title: Fix keyboard type for cocos2d::ui::EditBox::InputMode::NUMERIC.
data.body: Should be UIKeyboardTypeNumberPad.

data.title: NewAudioEngine bug after incoming call still exist (ios)
data.body: After the incoming call, if you refuse the call, the audio can resume normally. However, if you ANSWER the call and after several seconds finish the call, the audio will not resume any longer.

data.title: Update all version number to v3.10
data.body: @pandamicro Please review this PR

fix scale9sprite global zorder issue.
data.body: 1. it also fix the positiong issue when call setScale9Enabled(false)

data.title: Crashes on iOS 7 and iOS 9
data.body:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/app-crashes-on-ios9-cocos2dx-2-2-6/25527/5

It crashes a lot on iOS 7 and less often on iOS 9 due to gpus_ReturnNotPermittedKillClient.
I'm receiving thousands Ð¾f crash reports from crashlytics for several games (cocos2dx v3.7 & v3.8).
Unfortunately i don't have iOS 7 device so can't reliably reproduce this issue, on my iOS 9 devices i have seen it only once.

```

0  libGPUSupportMercury.dylib     0x348428f6 gpus_ReturnNotPermittedKillClient + 9
1  libGPUSupportMercury.dylib     0x34843391 gpusSubmitDataBuffers + 104
```

data.title: Fix deprecation warning in FontFNT
data.body:
This fixes the following warning when compiling in Xcode 7:

```
cocos/2d/CCFontFNT.cpp:824:23: 'getInstance' is deprecated
cocos/renderer/CCTextureCache.h:68:51: 'getInstance' has been explicitly marked deprecated here
```

data.title: Copy the resources to a separate folder on the Win32 output directory
data.body: Currently, Resources contents are copied to `$(OutDir)`. And that makes that folder overly crowded and hard to find the resource folders. This commit creates a `$(OutDir)\Resources` and copies the contents to that place.

data.title: update pageview to support adjust child size

fixes in how ref count is measured

data.title: CCSprite setSpriteFrame crash when  spriteFrame==nullptr
Is there any way that Box2d will bind to Lua?
data.body:
Currently, I used LiquidFun which based on Box2d to simulate liquid effect in my game. 

It seems Box2d isn't bind to Lua yet.

And I tried to make a new gen binding ini configure file for LiquidFun, which gives me an error: `The namespace (b2Shape::Type) conversion wasn't set in 'ns_map' section of the conversions.yaml`

How do I solve this error? And is there any quick and easy way that could I bind LiquidFun to Lua?

Thanks in advance!
